message: When I get out of the shower, I realize that I'm exhausted. I stagger to my room and collapse on the bed.
My eyes drift closed... and the next time I open them, it's late at night.
Something is jumping on my back.

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba. Wake up. Aoba."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hmm... Ren...? I thought you were in sleep mode..."

name: 蓮
message: "You activated me to talk before you went to sleep. Now, wake up."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What's the matter? Is your girlfriend Clara here or something?"

name: 蓮
message: "This is no time for jokes. The building is surrounded."
That knocks the sleepiness right out of me. I jump out of bed, then quiet my breathing and listen.
...There's something going on outside.

name: 蓮
message: "The details are unclear."

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's not like there's anyone who knows us in Platinum Jail. We should probably get out of here."

name: 蓮
message: "Agreed."
I get dressed, put Ren in my bag, and head straight to Noiz's room.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Noiz!"
Noiz is already out of bed and ready.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I dunno what's going on, but it doesn't look good. Let's get outta here!"

name: ノイズ
message: "...Yeah."
Despite his answer, Noiz doesn't move.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Come on. What are you doing?"

name: ノイズ
message: "What're you doing? Get outta here."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What?"

name: ノイズ
message: "I'll take care of myself. Why'd you even come over here, huh?"
...This shit again?
